categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Paul Weston (born January 7, 1940) was a stuntman who worked on Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. He played the Nikto character Vedain in that movie. He also portrayed Feyn Vann in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.
